testsuite.name: PersistenceManager Tests

testcase.name: load should load data from JSON format
load should load data from YAML format
load and save should preserve data
save should save data in JSON format
save should save data in YAML format
isFormatSupported should return false for XML
save with null entity type should throw exception
isFormatSupported should return true for JSON
isFormatSupported should return true for YAML
save with null items should throw exception
getSupportedFormats should return array with JSON and YAML
saveAllFormats should save data in both formats
save with unsupported format should throw exception
